segments.text: Okay . This trail looks the best . It's a little steep . But I'm sure it will be alright .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . You're the tour guide , I'll follow you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ... What a stink . This place stinks like rotten eggs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's sulphur you can smell . The whole of Taiwan is a volcanic region . That's why Taiwan has so many hot springs . It's volcanic activity.The sulfur smoke that you can smell is coming from those fumaroles over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Suddenly the ' great outdoors ' isn't so appealing . Let's hike a little faster ...
segments.speaker: S1
